trans-unit.source: Defines and represents a method (or constructor) on a dynamic class.
trans-unit.target: 定義及表示動態類別上的方法 (或建構函式)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder> class is used to fully describe a method in Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL), including the name, attributes, signature, and method body.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder>類別用來完整描述 Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL)，包括名稱、 屬性、 簽章和方法主體的方法。

trans-unit.source: It is used in conjunction with the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder> class to create classes at runtime.
trans-unit.target: 它用於搭配<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder>類別以建立在執行階段類別。

trans-unit.source: Global methods and methods as type members
trans-unit.target: 通用的方法和類型成員的方法

trans-unit.source: You can use reflection emit to define global methods and to define methods as type members.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用反映發出定義全域方法，以及定義為型別成員的方法。

trans-unit.source: The APIs that define methods return <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder> objects.
trans-unit.target: 定義方法的 Api 傳回<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder>物件。

trans-unit.source: Global methods
trans-unit.target: 全域方法

trans-unit.source: A global method is defined by using the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ModuleBuilder.DefineGlobalMethod%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method, which returns a **MethodBuilder** object.
trans-unit.target: 使用定義的全域方法<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ModuleBuilder.DefineGlobalMethod%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，這個方法會傳回**MethodBuilder**物件。

trans-unit.source: Global methods must be static.
trans-unit.target: 全域方法必須為靜態。

trans-unit.source: If a dynamic module contains global methods, the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ModuleBuilder.CreateGlobalFunctions%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method must be called before persisting the dynamic module or the containing dynamic assembly because the common language runtime postpones fixing up the dynamic module until all global functions have been defined.
trans-unit.target: 如果動態模組包含全域方法，<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ModuleBuilder.CreateGlobalFunctions%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>保存的動態模組或包含的動態組件，因為 common language runtime 延後修復的動態模組，直到所有的全域函式之前，必須呼叫方法尚未定義。

trans-unit.source: A global native method is defined by using the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ModuleBuilder.DefinePInvokeMethod%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 定義通用的原生方法使用<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ModuleBuilder.DefinePInvokeMethod%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: Platform invoke (PInvoke) methods must not be declared abstract or virtual.
trans-unit.target: 平台叫用 (PInvoke) 抽象或虛擬方法不能宣告。

trans-unit.source: The runtime sets the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodAttributes.PinvokeImpl?displayProperty=nameWithType> attribute for a platform invoke method.
trans-unit.target: 執行階段集<xref:System.Reflection.MethodAttributes.PinvokeImpl?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性平台叫用方法。

trans-unit.source: Methods as members of types
trans-unit.target: 方法的型別成員

trans-unit.source: A method is defined as a type member by using the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.DefineMethod%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method, which returns a <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder> object.
trans-unit.target: 方法定義為型別成員使用<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.DefineMethod%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，這個方法會傳回<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder>物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.DefineParameter%2A> method is used to set the name and parameter attributes of a parameter, or of the return value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.DefineParameter%2A>方法用來設定參數，或傳回值的名稱和參數的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ParameterBuilder> object returned by this method represents a parameter or the return value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ParameterBuilder>的參數或傳回值，代表這個方法所傳回的物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ParameterBuilder> object can be used to set the marshaling, to set the constant value, and to apply custom attributes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ParameterBuilder>物件可以用於封送處理的設定、 設定常數的值，並套用自訂屬性。

trans-unit.source: Attributes
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Members of the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodAttributes> enumeration define the precise character of a dynamic method:
trans-unit.target: 成員<xref:System.Reflection.MethodAttributes>列舉型別定義的動態方法的精確字元：

trans-unit.source: Static methods are specified using the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodAttributes.Static?displayProperty=nameWithType> attribute.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的靜態方法<xref:System.Reflection.MethodAttributes.Static?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Final methods (methods that cannot be overridden) are specified using the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodAttributes.Final?displayProperty=nameWithType> attribute.
trans-unit.target: 最後兩個方法 （不能覆寫的方法） 會使用指定<xref:System.Reflection.MethodAttributes.Final?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Virtual methods are specified using the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodAttributes.Virtual?displayProperty=nameWithType> attribute.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的虛擬方法<xref:System.Reflection.MethodAttributes.Virtual?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Abstract methods are specified using the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodAttributes.Abstract?displayProperty=nameWithType> attribute.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定抽象方法<xref:System.Reflection.MethodAttributes.Abstract?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Several attributes determine method visibility.
trans-unit.target: 有數個屬性會決定方法的可視性。

trans-unit.source: See the description of the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodAttributes> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱描述<xref:System.Reflection.MethodAttributes>列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: Methods that implement overloaded operators must set the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodAttributes.SpecialName?displayProperty=nameWithType> attribute.
trans-unit.target: 實作多載的運算子之方法必須設定<xref:System.Reflection.MethodAttributes.SpecialName?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Finalizers must set the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodAttributes.SpecialName?displayProperty=nameWithType> attribute.
trans-unit.target: 完成項必須設定<xref:System.Reflection.MethodAttributes.SpecialName?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Known Issues
trans-unit.target: 已知問題

trans-unit.source: Although <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder> is derived from <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>, some of the abstract methods defined in the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> class are not fully implemented in <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder>.
trans-unit.target: 雖然<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder>衍生自<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>，部分中所定義的抽象方法<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>類別並未完整實作中<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder>。

trans-unit.source: These <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder> methods throw the <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: 這些<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder>方法會擲回<xref:System.NotSupportedException>。

trans-unit.source: For example the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.Invoke%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method is not fully implemented.
trans-unit.target: 例如<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.Invoke%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>未完全實作的方法。

trans-unit.source: You can reflect on these methods by retrieving the enclosing type using the <xref:System.Type.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> methods.
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由擷取封入類型使用這些方法上反映<xref:System.Type.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: Custom modifiers are supported starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0.
trans-unit.target: 從.NET Framework 2.0 版支援的自訂修飾詞。

trans-unit.source: They are not supported in earlier versions.
trans-unit.target: 它們不支援在舊版本。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder> class to create a method within a dynamic type.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder>類別來建立動態類型中的方法。

trans-unit.source: The security action to be taken (Demand, Assert, and so on).
trans-unit.target: 要採取的安全性動作 (要求、判斷提示等)。

trans-unit.source: The set of permissions the action applies to.
trans-unit.target: 此動作適用的權限集。

trans-unit.source: Adds declarative security to this method.
trans-unit.target: 加入這個方法的宣告式安全性。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.AddDeclarativeSecurity%2A> can be called several times, with each call specifying a security action (such as `Demand`, `Assert`, and `Deny`) and a set of permissions that the action applies to.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.AddDeclarativeSecurity%2A> 也可以呼叫多次，每次呼叫指定的安全性動作 (例如`Demand`， `Assert`，和`Deny`) 和一組要套用動作的權限。

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework versions 1.0, 1.1, and 2.0, the declarative security attributes applied to a method by using the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.AddDeclarativeSecurity%2A> method are stored in the old XML metadata format.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET framework 1.0、 1.1 和 2.0 中，使用套用至方法的宣告式安全性屬性<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.AddDeclarativeSecurity%2A>方法會儲存在舊的 XML 中繼資料格式。

trans-unit.source: See Emitting Declarative Security Attributes.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱發出宣告式安全性屬性。

trans-unit.source: The code sample below illustrates the contextual use of `AddDeclarativeSecurity` to require the caller of a method to have unrestricted permissions.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例說明的內容使用`AddDeclarativeSecurity`要求的方法呼叫端具有不受限制的權限。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="action" /> is invalid (<see langword="RequestMinimum" />, <see langword="RequestOptional" />, and <see langword="RequestRefuse" /> are invalid).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="action" /> 無效 (<see langword="RequestMinimum" />、<see langword="RequestOptional" /> 和 <see langword="RequestRefuse" /> 無效)。

trans-unit.source: The containing type has been created using <see cref="M:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType" />.
trans-unit.target: 已使用 <see cref="M:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType" /> 建立包含類型。

trans-unit.source: -or-

The permission set <paramref name="pset" /> contains an action that was added earlier by <see cref="M:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.AddDeclarativeSecurity(System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction,System.Security.PermissionSet)" />.
trans-unit.target: 權限集 <paramref name="pset" /> 包含稍早 <see cref="M:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.AddDeclarativeSecurity(System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction,System.Security.PermissionSet)" /> 所加入的動作。

trans-unit.source: -or-

For the current method, the <see cref="P:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.IsGenericMethod" /> property is <see langword="true" />, but the <see cref="P:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.IsGenericMethodDefinition" /> property is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 針對於目前的方法，<see cref="P:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.IsGenericMethod" /> 屬性為 <see langword="true" />，但 <see cref="P:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.IsGenericMethodDefinition" /> 屬性為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="pset" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="pset" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the attributes for this method.
trans-unit.target: 擷取此方法的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Read-only.
trans-unit.target: 唯讀。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the <see langword="MethodAttributes" /> for this method.
trans-unit.target: 擷取此方法的 <see langword="MethodAttributes" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the calling convention of the method.
trans-unit.target: 傳回方法的呼叫慣例。

trans-unit.source: Read-only.
trans-unit.target: 唯讀。

trans-unit.source: The calling convention of the method.
trans-unit.target: 方法的呼叫慣例。

trans-unit.source: Not supported for this type.
trans-unit.target: 現在支援這種類型。

trans-unit.source: Not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder> always represents a generic method definition, and thus cannot be invoked.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder>永遠代表泛型方法定義，並因此不能叫用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase.IsGenericMethod%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase.ContainsGenericParameters%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase.IsGenericMethod%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 與 <xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase.ContainsGenericParameters%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: For information on generic types, see <xref:System.Type.IsGenericType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 在泛型類型上的資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Type.IsGenericType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The invoked method is not supported in the base class.
trans-unit.target: 基底類別不支援叫用的方法。

trans-unit.source: An array containing valid MSIL instructions.
trans-unit.target: 包含有效 MSIL 指示的陣列。

trans-unit.source: If this parameter is <see langword="null" />, the method's body is cleared.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個參數是 <see langword="null" />，便會清除該方法的主體。

trans-unit.source: The number of valid bytes in the MSIL array.
trans-unit.target: MSIL 陣列中的有效位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: This value is ignored if MSIL is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 MSIL 是 <see langword="null" />，就會忽略這個值。

trans-unit.source: Creates the body of the method using a supplied byte array of Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) instructions.
trans-unit.target: 建立方法的主體，方法是使用 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 指示所提供的位元組陣列。

trans-unit.source: This method creates the method's body from `il`, an array containing MSIL instructions as opcodes.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會建立該方法的主體從`il`、 陣列，其中包含為作業碼的 MSIL 指令。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes of valid MSIL is given by count.
trans-unit.target: 依計數，會提供有效 MSIL 的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: This is currently not fully supported.
trans-unit.target: 這是目前不完全支援。

trans-unit.source: The user cannot supply the location of token fix ups and exception handlers.
trans-unit.target: 使用者無法提供語彙基元的修復動作和例外狀況處理常式的位置。

trans-unit.source: In the example provided below, a simple method that adds two integers is generated via opcode using `CreateMethodBody`.
trans-unit.target: 在下面將提供範例中，將兩個整數的簡單方法透過 opcode 使用產生`CreateMethodBody`。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="count" /> is not within the range of indexes of the supplied MSIL instruction array and <paramref name="il" /> is not <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="count" /> 不在提供的 MSIL 指示陣列中的索引範圍內，且 <paramref name="il" /> 不是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The containing type was previously created using <see cref="M:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType" />.
trans-unit.target: 先前已使用 <see cref="M:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType" /> 建立包含類型。

trans-unit.source: -or-
This method was called previously on this <see langword="MethodBuilder" /> with an <paramref name="il" /> argument that was not <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法之前是在 <see langword="MethodBuilder" /> 物件上，以非 <see langword="null" /> 的 <paramref name="il" /> 引數所呼叫。

trans-unit.source: -or-

For the current method, the <see cref="P:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.IsGenericMethod" /> property is <see langword="true" />, but the <see cref="P:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.IsGenericMethodDefinition" /> property is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 針對於目前的方法，<see cref="P:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.IsGenericMethod" /> 屬性為 <see langword="true" />，但 <see cref="P:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.IsGenericMethodDefinition" /> 屬性為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the type that declares this method.
trans-unit.target: 傳回宣告這個方法的類型。

trans-unit.source: Read-only.
trans-unit.target: 唯讀。

trans-unit.source: The type that declares this method.
trans-unit.target: 宣告這個方法的類型。

trans-unit.source: The following code illustrates the use of the `Type` property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼說明如何使用`Type`屬性。

trans-unit.source: An array of strings that represent the names of the generic type parameters.
trans-unit.target: 由字串組成的陣列，代表泛型類型參數的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Sets the number of generic type parameters for the current method, specifies their names, and returns an array of <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.GenericTypeParameterBuilder" /> objects that can be used to define their constraints.
trans-unit.target: 設定目前方法的泛型類型參數數目、指定其名稱，並傳回可用來定義其條件約束的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.GenericTypeParameterBuilder" /> 物件陣列。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.GenericTypeParameterBuilder" /> objects representing the type parameters of the generic method.
trans-unit.target: 由 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.GenericTypeParameterBuilder" /> 物件組成的陣列，代表泛型方法的類型參數。

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.DefineGenericParameters%2A> method makes the current method generic.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.DefineGenericParameters%2A>泛型的方法會將目前的方法。

trans-unit.source: There is no way to undo this change.
trans-unit.target: 沒有任何方式能夠復原這項變更。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method a second time causes an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: 第二次呼叫這個方法會導致<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>。

trans-unit.source: The type parameters of the generic method can be retrieved later by using the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.GetGenericArguments%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 泛型方法的型別參數可以稍後擷取使用<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.GetGenericArguments%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: By convention, a type parameter name is a single uppercase letter.
trans-unit.target: 依照慣例，型別參數名稱會是單一的大寫字母。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase.IsGenericMethod%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo.GetGenericMethodDefinition%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase.IsGenericMethod%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 與 <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo.GetGenericMethodDefinition%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: For information on generic types, see <xref:System.Type.IsGenericType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 在泛型類型上的資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Type.IsGenericType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a dynamic type, `DemoType`, which contains the dynamic generic method `DemoMethod`.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立動態類型`DemoType`，其中包含動態泛型方法`DemoMethod`。

trans-unit.source: This method has two generic type parameters, one of which is used as a parameter, and the other as the return type.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法有兩個泛型型別參數，其中做為參數，和另一個則為傳回型別。

trans-unit.source: When the code is executed, the dynamic assembly is saved as DemoGenericMethod1.dll, and can be examined using the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md).
trans-unit.target: 執行程式碼時，動態組件會儲存為 DemoGenericMethod1.dll，以及可以使用檢查[Ildasm.exe （IL 反組譯工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)。

trans-unit.source: This code example generates a simple method body that merely returns a null reference.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例會產生簡單的方法主體，只會傳回 null 參考。

trans-unit.source: For a code example with a more fully developed method body that creates and uses generic types, see [How to: Define a Generic Method with Reflection Emit](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/how-to-define-a-generic-method-with-reflection-emit.md).
trans-unit.target: 具有多個完整開發的方法主體的建立及使用泛型類型的程式碼範例，請參閱[如何： 定義泛型方法使用反映發出](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/how-to-define-a-generic-method-with-reflection-emit.md)。

trans-unit.source: Generic type parameters have already been defined for this method.
trans-unit.target: 已定義這個方法的泛型類型參數。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The method has been completed already.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法已經完成。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <see cref="M:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.SetImplementationFlags(System.Reflection.MethodImplAttributes)" /> method has been called for the current method.
trans-unit.target: 已對目前的執行個體呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.SetImplementationFlags(System.Reflection.MethodImplAttributes)" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="names" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="names" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
An element of <paramref name="names" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="names" /> 的項目是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="names" /> is an empty array.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="names" /> 是空陣列。

trans-unit.source: The position of the parameter in the parameter list.
trans-unit.target: 在參數清單中參數的位置。

trans-unit.source: Parameters are indexed beginning with the number 1 for the first parameter; the number 0 represents the return value of the method.
trans-unit.target: 第一個參數的參數索引從數字 1 開始，數字 0 表示方法的傳回值。

trans-unit.source: The parameter attributes of the parameter.
trans-unit.target: 參數的參數屬性。

trans-unit.source: The name of the parameter.
trans-unit.target: 參數名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name can be the null string.
trans-unit.target: 名稱可以是 null 字串。

trans-unit.source: Sets the parameter attributes and the name of a parameter of this method, or of the return value of this method.
trans-unit.target: 設定參數屬性和這個方法或這個方法傳回值的參數名稱。

trans-unit.source: Returns a ParameterBuilder that can be used to apply custom attributes.

trans-unit.source: Parameter numbering begins with 1, so `position` is 1 for the first parameter.
trans-unit.target: 參數編號從 1 開始，因此`position`為 1，第一個參數。

trans-unit.source: If `position` is zero, this method affects the return value.
trans-unit.target: 如果`position`是零，則這個方法會影響傳回的值。

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, an exception is thrown if `position` is zero, so this method cannot be used to modify attributes of the return value in those versions.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，會擲回例外狀況`position`是零，因此這個方法無法用來修改這些版本中的傳回值的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether the local variables in this method are zero initialized.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定布林值，指定在這個方法中的區域變數是否以零起始。

trans-unit.source: The default value of this property is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性的預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the local variables in this method should be zero initialized; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在這個方法中的區域變數應該以零起始，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to `true`, the emitted MSIL includes initialization of local variables.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個屬性設定為`true`，發出的 MSIL 包括可用的本機變數的初始化。

trans-unit.source: If it is set to `false`, local variables are not initialized and the generated code is unverifiable.
trans-unit.target: 如果設定為`false`、 未初始化的區域變數和產生的程式碼，將無法驗證。

trans-unit.source: For the current method, the <see cref="P:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.IsGenericMethod" /> property is <see langword="true" />, but the <see cref="P:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.IsGenericMethodDefinition" /> property is <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: (Get or set.)
trans-unit.target: (Get 或 Set。)

trans-unit.source: The object on which to invoke the specified method.
trans-unit.target: 要在其上叫用指定方法的物件。

trans-unit.source: If the method is static, this parameter is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果是靜態方法，則會忽略這個參數。

trans-unit.source: This must be a bit flag from <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> : <see langword="InvokeMethod" />, <see langword="NonPublic" />, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 這必須是 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> 中的位元旗標：<see langword="InvokeMethod" />、<see langword="NonPublic" /> 等等。

trans-unit.source: An object that enables the binding, coercion of argument types, invocation of members, and retrieval of MemberInfo objects via reflection.
trans-unit.target: 此物件能用來啟用繫結、引數的強制型轉、成員的引動過程，以及透過反映來擷取 MemberInfo 物件等功能。

trans-unit.source: If binder is <see langword="null" />, the default binder is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果繫結器為 <see langword="null" />，則會使用預設繫結器。

trans-unit.source: For more details, see <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Binder" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Binder" />。

trans-unit.source: An argument list.
trans-unit.target: 引數清單。

trans-unit.source: This is an array of arguments with the same number, order, and type as the parameters of the method to be invoked.
trans-unit.target: 這是引數陣列，其數目、順序和類型與要叫用的方法參數相同。

trans-unit.source: If there are no parameters this should be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有參數，則這應該為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> used to govern the coercion of types.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> 的執行個體，用於管理類型的強制型轉。

trans-unit.source: If this is null, the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> for the current thread is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果這是 null，會使用目前執行緒的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" />

trans-unit.source: (Note that this is necessary to, for example, convert a <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents 1000 to a <see cref="T:System.Double" /> value, since 1000 is represented differently by different cultures.)
trans-unit.target: (請注意，例如要將表示 1000 的 <see cref="T:System.String" /> 轉換成 <see cref="T:System.Double" /> 值時，這是必要的，因為 1000 在不同文化特性中有不同的表示方式)。

trans-unit.source: Dynamically invokes the method reflected by this instance on the given object, passing along the specified parameters, and under the constraints of the given binder.
trans-unit.target: 動態叫用這個執行個體在指定物件上反映的方法，沿著指定參數，在指定繫結器的條件約束下傳遞。

trans-unit.source: Returns an object containing the return value of the invoked method.
trans-unit.target: 傳回包含已叫用方法之傳回值的物件。

trans-unit.source: If the method is static, the `obj` parameter is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個方法是靜態，`obj`參數已忽略。

trans-unit.source: For non-static methods, `obj` should be an instance of a class that inherits or declares the method and must be the same type as this class.
trans-unit.target: 對於非靜態方法，`obj`應該類別繼承，或是宣告方法，必須是相同的類型與這個類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: If the method has no parameters, the value of `parameters` should be `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果方法沒有參數，值`parameters`應該`null`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise the number, type, and order of elements in the parameters array should be identical to the number, type, and order of parameters for the method reflected by this instance.
trans-unit.target: 否則數字、 類型和參數陣列中項目的順序應該與數字、 類型和這個執行個體所反映的方法參數順序相同。

trans-unit.source: Access restrictions are ignored for fully-trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 完全信任的程式碼會忽略存取限制。

trans-unit.source: That is, private constructors, methods, fields, and properties can be accessed and invoked using Reflection whenever the code is fully-trusted.
trans-unit.target: 也就是說，私用建構函式、 方法、 欄位和屬性可以存取，而且只要完全信任程式碼使用反映來叫用。

trans-unit.source: This method is not currently supported.
trans-unit.target: 目前不支援這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Retrieve the method using <see cref="M:System.Type.GetMethod(System.String,System.Reflection.BindingFlags,System.Reflection.Binder,System.Reflection.CallingConventions,System.Type[],System.Reflection.ParameterModifier[])" /> and call <see cref="M:System.Type.InvokeMember(System.String,System.Reflection.BindingFlags,System.Reflection.Binder,System.Object,System.Object[],System.Reflection.ParameterModifier[],System.Globalization.CultureInfo,System.String[])" /> on the returned <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" />.

trans-unit.source: The custom attribute type.

trans-unit.target: 指定是否要搜尋這個成員的繼承鏈結以尋找自訂屬性。

trans-unit.source: Checks if the specified custom attribute type is defined.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the method is a generic method.
trans-unit.target: 取得可指出此方法是否為泛型方法的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the method is generic; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果方法是泛型，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A method is generic if it has type parameters.
trans-unit.target: 方法是泛型，如果類型參數。

trans-unit.source: You can make a method generic by calling the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.DefineGenericParameters%2A> method to add type parameters.
trans-unit.target: 您可以讓方法一般呼叫<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.DefineGenericParameters%2A>方法，將型別參數。

trans-unit.source: This change cannot be reversed.
trans-unit.target: 這項變更無法回復。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays the status of a method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會顯示方法的狀態。

trans-unit.target: 這段程式碼是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.DefineGenericParameters%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the current <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder" /> object represents the definition of a generic method.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出目前的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder" /> 物件是否代表泛型方法的定義。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder" /> object represents the definition of a generic method; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder" /> 物件代表泛型方法的定義，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder> can only be used to create generic method definitions; it cannot be used to create a constructed generic method directly.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder>只可用來建立泛型方法定義中; 它不能直接建立建構的泛型方法。

trans-unit.source: However, a subclass of <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder> might represent a constructed generic method.
trans-unit.target: 不過，子類別的<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder>可能代表建構的泛型方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays the status of a method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會顯示方法的狀態。

trans-unit.source: Throws a <see cref="T:System.NotSupportedException" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 在所有情況下都擲回 <see cref="T:System.NotSupportedException" />。

trans-unit.target: 在所有情況下都擲回 <see cref="T:System.NotSupportedException" />。

trans-unit.source: To determine whether a method in a dynamic assembly is security-critical, complete the type by calling <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, call the <xref:System.Type.GetMethod%2A> method on the completed type, and get the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase.IsSecurityCritical%2A> property on the resulting <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷是否為安全性關鍵的動態組件中的方法，完成的型別呼叫<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>，呼叫<xref:System.Type.GetMethod%2A>上已完成的型別和 get 方法<xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase.IsSecurityCritical%2A>上產生屬性<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>。

trans-unit.source: In all cases.
trans-unit.target: 在所有情況下。

trans-unit.source: This property is not supported in dynamic assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 動態組件不支援這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: Throws a <see cref="T:System.NotSupportedException" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 在所有情況下都擲回 <see cref="T:System.NotSupportedException" />。

trans-unit.source: Throws a <see cref="T:System.NotSupportedException" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 在所有情況下都擲回 <see cref="T:System.NotSupportedException" />。

trans-unit.source: To determine whether a method in a dynamic assembly is security-safe-critical, complete the type by calling <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, call the <xref:System.Type.GetMethod%2A> method on the completed type, and get the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase.IsSecuritySafeCritical%2A> property on the resulting <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷在動態組件中的方法是否為安全性安全關鍵，完成的型別呼叫<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>，呼叫<xref:System.Type.GetMethod%2A>上已完成的型別和 get 方法<xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase.IsSecuritySafeCritical%2A>上產生屬性<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>。

trans-unit.source: In all cases.
trans-unit.target: 在所有情況下。

trans-unit.source: This property is not supported in dynamic assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 動態組件不支援這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: Throws a <see cref="T:System.NotSupportedException" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 在所有情況下都擲回 <see cref="T:System.NotSupportedException" />。

trans-unit.source: Throws a <see cref="T:System.NotSupportedException" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 在所有情況下都擲回 <see cref="T:System.NotSupportedException" />。

trans-unit.source: To determine whether a method in a dynamic assembly is security-transparent, complete the type by calling <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, call the <xref:System.Type.GetMethod%2A> method on the completed type, and get the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase.IsSecurityTransparent%2A> property on the resulting <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷在動態組件中的方法是否為安全性透明，完成的型別呼叫<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>，呼叫<xref:System.Type.GetMethod%2A>上已完成的型別和 get 方法<xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase.IsSecurityTransparent%2A>上產生屬性<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>。

trans-unit.source: In all cases.
trans-unit.target: 在所有情況下。

trans-unit.source: This property is not supported in dynamic assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 動態組件不支援這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Type" /> objects that represent the type arguments for the generic method.
trans-unit.target: 由 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 物件組成的陣列，代表泛型方法的類型引數。

trans-unit.source: Returns a generic method constructed from the current generic method definition using the specified generic type arguments.
trans-unit.target: 傳回使用指定的泛型類型引數，從目前的泛型方法定義建構的泛型方法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> representing the generic method constructed from the current generic method definition using the specified generic type arguments.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" />，代表使用指定的泛型類型引數，從目前的泛型方法定義建構的泛型方法。

trans-unit.source: When you are emitting dynamic code, you might need to emit a call to a method constructed from the generic method definition represented by a <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder>, before the enclosing type has been completed.
trans-unit.target: 當您要發出動態程式碼時，您可能需要發出呼叫的方法，從所代表的泛型方法定義建構<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder>，才能完成封入類型。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.MakeGenericMethod%2A> method to create a <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> for such a constructed method, and use the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> in the emitted call.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.MakeGenericMethod%2A>方法來建立<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>這類建構的方法，和使用<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>發出的呼叫中。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a constructed method from an incomplete generic method definition in an incomplete type.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立從完整的泛型方法定義中不完整的型別建構的方法。

trans-unit.source: The example creates a transient assembly and module with a single type, adds a method `M`, and makes the method generic by adding a type parameter T using the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.DefineGenericParameters%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會建立與單一類型的暫時性組件和模組、 將方法加入`M`，並會將方法加上使用類型參數 T 的泛型<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.DefineGenericParameters%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The type parameter is used as the type of the method's parameter, and also as its return type.
trans-unit.target: 型別參數用做為方法的參數類型以及其傳回型別。

trans-unit.source: The generic method definition is not given a body, and the enclosing type is not completed.
trans-unit.target: 泛型方法定義未指定主體，並不會完成封入類型。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.MakeGenericMethod%2A> method is then used to make the constructed method `M<String>` (`M(Of String)` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.MakeGenericMethod%2A>方法用來進行的建構的方法`M<String>`(`M(Of String)`在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: The example code has no output, because the subclass of <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> returned by the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.MakeGenericMethod%2A> method does not allow reflection over its parameters.
trans-unit.target: 範例程式碼有任何輸出，因為子類別的<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>傳回<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.MakeGenericMethod%2A>方法不允許透過其參數的反映。

trans-unit.source: For another code example that uses <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.MakeGenericMethod%2A>, see <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.DefineGenericParameters%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 另一個程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.MakeGenericMethod%2A>，請參閱<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.DefineGenericParameters%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.MakeGenericMethod%2A> is also used extensively when emitting code that uses generic types.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.MakeGenericMethod%2A> 也廣泛時發出程式碼使用泛型型別。

trans-unit.source: See [How to: Define a Generic Method with Reflection Emit](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/how-to-define-a-generic-method-with-reflection-emit.md).
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[如何： 定義泛型方法使用反映發出](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/how-to-define-a-generic-method-with-reflection-emit.md)。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the internal handle for the method.
trans-unit.target: 擷取方法的內部控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: Use this handle to access the underlying metadata handle.
trans-unit.target: 使用此控制代碼來存取基礎中繼資料控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: Read-only.
trans-unit.target: 唯讀。

trans-unit.source: The internal handle for the method.

trans-unit.target: 使用這個控制代碼來存取基礎中繼資料控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: This method is not currently supported.
trans-unit.target: 目前不支援這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Retrieve the method using <see cref="M:System.Type.GetMethod(System.String,System.Reflection.BindingFlags,System.Reflection.Binder,System.Reflection.CallingConventions,System.Type[],System.Reflection.ParameterModifier[])" /> and call <see cref="P:System.Reflection.MethodBase.MethodHandle" /> on the returned <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="M:System.Type.GetMethod(System.String,System.Reflection.BindingFlags,System.Reflection.Binder,System.Reflection.CallingConventions,System.Type[],System.Reflection.ParameterModifier[])" /> 擷取方法並在傳回的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> 上呼叫 <see cref="P:System.Reflection.MethodBase.MethodHandle" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the module in which the current method is being defined.
trans-unit.target: 取得所要定義之目前方法中的模組。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Module" /> in which the member represented by the current <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberInfo" /> is being defined.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Module" />，在其中定義目前 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberInfo" /> 所表示的成員。

trans-unit.source: This property is provided as a convenience.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，已提供這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: It is equivalent to using the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.DeclaringType%2A> property to get the type in which the method is being declared, and then calling the <xref:System.Type.Module%2A> property of the resulting <xref:System.Type> object.
trans-unit.target: 它相當於使用<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.DeclaringType%2A>屬性來取得的類型中所宣告的方法，並再呼叫<xref:System.Type.Module%2A>屬性產生<xref:System.Type>物件。

trans-unit.source: This property is also equivalent to calling <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.GetModule%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性也是相當於呼叫<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.GetModule%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the name of this method.
trans-unit.target: 擷取這個方法的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Read-only.
trans-unit.target: 唯讀。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a string containing the simple name of this method.
trans-unit.target: 擷取含有這個方法之簡單名稱的字串。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the class that was used in reflection to obtain this object.
trans-unit.target: 取得用於反映中以取得方法的類別。

trans-unit.source: Read-only.
trans-unit.target: 唯讀。

trans-unit.source: The type used to obtain this method.
trans-unit.target: 用來取得這個方法的類型。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Reflection.ParameterInfo" /> object that contains information about the return type of the method, such as whether the return type has custom modifiers.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.ParameterInfo" /> 物件，這個物件包含方法之傳回類型的相關資訊，例如傳回類型是否具有自訂修飾詞。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.ParameterInfo" /> object that contains information about the return type.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Reflection.ParameterInfo" /> 物件，包含傳回類型的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: Compiler designers can use the <xref:System.Reflection.ParameterInfo> object returned by this property to discover whether custom modifiers, such as <xref:Microsoft.VisualC.IsConstModifier>, have been applied to the return type.
trans-unit.target: 編譯器設計人員可以使用<xref:System.Reflection.ParameterInfo>來探索是否自訂這個屬性所傳回的物件修飾詞，例如<xref:Microsoft.VisualC.IsConstModifier>，已套用至傳回型別。

trans-unit.source: The declaring type has not been created.
trans-unit.target: 尚未建立宣告類型。

trans-unit.source: Gets the return type of the method represented by this <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder" /> 所表示之方法的傳回類型。

trans-unit.source: The return type of the method.
trans-unit.target: 該方法的傳回類型。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0 and the .NET Compact Framework 2.0, this member is inherited from the base class, <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>.
trans-unit.target: 從.NET Framework 2.0 和.NET Compact Framework 2.0，這個成員繼承自基底類別， <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo.ReturnType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱 <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo.ReturnType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Returns the custom attributes of the method's return type.
trans-unit.target: 傳回方法之傳回型別的自訂屬性。

trans-unit.source: Read-only.
trans-unit.target: 唯讀。

trans-unit.source: The custom attributes of the method's return type.
trans-unit.target: 方法之傳回型別的自訂屬性。

trans-unit.source: This method always returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法一律會傳回 `null`。

trans-unit.source: Get the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> after the containing <xref:System.Type> has been created and invoked <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo.ReturnTypeCustomAttributes%2A> on the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>之後包含<xref:System.Type>已建立並叫用<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo.ReturnTypeCustomAttributes%2A>上<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>。

trans-unit.source: Sets a custom attribute.
trans-unit.target: 設定自訂屬性。

trans-unit.source: An instance of a helper class to describe the custom attribute.
trans-unit.target: 要描述自訂屬性之協助程式的類別執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Sets a custom attribute using a custom attribute builder.
trans-unit.target: 使用自訂屬性產生器來設定自訂屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.SetCustomAttribute%2A> method can interact with the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.SetImplementationFlags%2A> method when the two methods are used in combination.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.SetCustomAttribute%2A>方法可以互動<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.SetImplementationFlags%2A>方法搭配使用的兩種方法時。

trans-unit.source: See the Remarks section of the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.SetImplementationFlags%2A> method for details.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱 < 備註 > 一節的<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.SetImplementationFlags%2A>方法，如需詳細資訊。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="customBuilder" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="customBuilder" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: For the current method, the <see cref="P:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.IsGenericMethod" /> property is <see langword="true" />, but the <see cref="P:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.IsGenericMethodDefinition" /> property is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 針對於目前的方法，<see cref="P:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.IsGenericMethod" /> 屬性為 <see langword="true" />，但 <see cref="P:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.IsGenericMethodDefinition" /> 屬性為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The constructor for the custom attribute.
trans-unit.target: 自訂屬性的建構函式。

trans-unit.source: A byte blob representing the attributes.
trans-unit.target: 代表屬性的位元組 Blob。

trans-unit.source: Sets a custom attribute using a specified custom attribute blob.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的自訂屬性 Blob 來設定自訂屬性。

trans-unit.source: For details on how to format `binaryAttribute`, see the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) documentation, especially "Partition II: Metadata Definition and Semantics".
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，如何格式化`binaryAttribute`，請參閱 Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) 文件，尤其是 < 磁碟分割 II： 中繼資料定義和語意 >。

trans-unit.source: The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site.
trans-unit.target: 您可以線上取得這份文件；請參閱 MSDN 上的 [ECMA C# 和通用語言基礎結構標準](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)，以及 Ecma International 網站上的[標準 ECMA-335 - 通用語言基礎結構 (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.SetCustomAttribute%2A> method can interact with the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.SetImplementationFlags%2A> method when the two methods are used in combination.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.SetCustomAttribute%2A>方法可以互動<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.SetImplementationFlags%2A>方法搭配使用的兩種方法時。

trans-unit.source: See the Remarks section of the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.SetImplementationFlags%2A> method for details.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱 < 備註 > 一節的<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.SetImplementationFlags%2A>方法，如需詳細資訊。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="con" /> or <paramref name="binaryAttribute" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="con" /> 或 <paramref name="binaryAttribute" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: For the current method, the <see cref="P:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.IsGenericMethod" /> property is <see langword="true" />, but the <see cref="P:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.IsGenericMethodDefinition" /> property is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 針對於目前的方法，<see cref="P:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.IsGenericMethod" /> 屬性為 <see langword="true" />，但 <see cref="P:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.IsGenericMethodDefinition" /> 屬性為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The implementation flags to set.
trans-unit.target: 要設定的實作旗標。

trans-unit.source: Sets the implementation flags for this method.
trans-unit.target: 設定此方法的實作旗標。

trans-unit.source: When you use the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.SetImplementationFlags%2A> method in combination with the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.SetCustomAttribute%2A> method, be aware of potential interactions.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.SetImplementationFlags%2A>方法搭配<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.SetCustomAttribute%2A>方法中，注意潛在的互動。

trans-unit.source: For example, using the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.SetCustomAttribute%2A> method to add the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportAttribute> attribute also sets the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodImplAttributes.PreserveSig?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag.
trans-unit.target: 例如，使用<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.SetCustomAttribute%2A>方法，將<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportAttribute>也屬性集<xref:System.Reflection.MethodImplAttributes.PreserveSig?displayProperty=nameWithType>旗標。

trans-unit.source: If you subsequently call the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.SetImplementationFlags%2A> method, the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodImplAttributes.PreserveSig> flag is overwritten.
trans-unit.target: 如果您後續呼叫<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.SetImplementationFlags%2A>方法，<xref:System.Reflection.MethodImplAttributes.PreserveSig>會覆寫旗標。

trans-unit.source: There are two ways to avoid this:
trans-unit.target: 有兩種方式可避免此狀況：

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.SetImplementationFlags%2A> method before you call the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.SetCustomAttribute%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.SetImplementationFlags%2A>方法呼叫之前<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.SetCustomAttribute%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.SetCustomAttribute%2A> method always respects existing method implementation flags.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.SetCustomAttribute%2A>方法一律會接受現有的方法實作旗標。

trans-unit.source: When you set implementation flags, call the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.GetMethodImplementationFlags%2A> method to retrieve the existing flags, use bitwise OR to add your flag, and then call the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.SetImplementationFlags%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 當您設定的實作旗標時，呼叫<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.GetMethodImplementationFlags%2A>方法來擷取現有的旗標，請使用位元或，新增您的旗標，然後再呼叫<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.SetImplementationFlags%2A>方法。

This method was called previously on this <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 先前已在這個 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder" /> 物件上呼叫此方法。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Type" /> objects representing the parameter types.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 物件的陣列，代參數類型。

trans-unit.source: Sets the number and types of parameters for a method.
trans-unit.target: 設定方法的參數類型與數量。

trans-unit.source: If the number and types of the parameters are known when the method is defined, they can be set using any overload of the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.DefineMethod%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method that accepts an array of parameter types.
trans-unit.target: 如果參數的類型與數量已知所定義之方法，您可以設定使用的任何多載<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.DefineMethod%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法可接受的參數類型陣列。

trans-unit.source: However, a generic method can have parameters whose types are specified by one or more of its own generic type parameters, which cannot be defined until after the method has been defined.
trans-unit.target: 不過，泛型方法的參數型別由一或多個它自己的泛型類型參數，定義方法之後不能定義之前。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to set the parameter types in that case.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定的參數型別在此情況下使用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: If the return type has optional or required custom modifiers, such as <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.IsConst>, use the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.SetSignature%28System.Type%2CSystem.Type%5B%5D%2CSystem.Type%5B%5D%2CSystem.Type%5B%5D%2CSystem.Type%5B%5D%5B%5D%2CSystem.Type%5B%5D%5B%5D%29> method overload.
trans-unit.target: 如果傳回型別有選擇性或必要自訂修飾詞，例如<xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.IsConst>，使用<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.SetSignature%28System.Type%2CSystem.Type%5B%5D%2CSystem.Type%5B%5D%2CSystem.Type%5B%5D%2CSystem.Type%5B%5D%5B%5D%2CSystem.Type%5B%5D%5B%5D%29>方法多載。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method replaces any parameter types that were set using the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.DefineMethod%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法會取代任何已設定使用的參數型別<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.DefineMethod%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.target: 若要設定泛型方法的傳回型別，其中一個方法的泛型型別參數所指定的傳回型別時使用這個方法。

trans-unit.target: 如果傳回型別有選擇性或必要自訂修飾詞，例如<xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.IsConst>，使用<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.SetSignature%28System.Type%2CSystem.Type%5B%5D%2CSystem.Type%5B%5D%2CSystem.Type%5B%5D%2CSystem.Type%5B%5D%5B%5D%2CSystem.Type%5B%5D%5B%5D%29>方法多載。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method replaces a return type established using the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.DefineMethod%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.SetParameters%2A> method is used to give the method one parameter, whose type will be specified by the first generic type parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.SetParameters%2A>方法用來提供方法的一個參數，將第一個泛型型別參數所指定型別。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.SetReturnType%2A>方法用來指定方法的傳回型別，第二個泛型型別參數所指定。

trans-unit.target: 目前的方法是泛型，但不是泛型方法定義。

trans-unit.source: That is, the <see cref="P:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.IsGenericMethod" /> property is <see langword="true" />, but the <see cref="P:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.IsGenericMethodDefinition" /> property is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 亦即，<see cref="P:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.IsGenericMethod" /> 屬性是 <see langword="true" />，但 <see cref="P:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.IsGenericMethodDefinition" /> 屬性是 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The return type of the method.
trans-unit.target: 該方法的傳回類型。

trans-unit.target: 代表該方法傳回類型之必要自訂修飾詞的類型陣列，例如 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.IsConst" />。

trans-unit.source: If the return type has no required custom modifiers, specify <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果傳回類型沒有必要的自訂修飾詞，則指定 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An array of types representing the optional custom modifiers, such as <see cref="T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.IsConst" />, for the return type of the method.
trans-unit.target: 一種類型陣列，用來為方法的傳回類型指出選擇性自訂修飾詞，例如 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.IsConst" />。

trans-unit.source: If the return type has no optional custom modifiers, specify <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果傳回類型沒有選擇性的自訂修飾詞，則指定 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The types of the parameters of the method.
trans-unit.target: 方法的參數類型。

trans-unit.source: An array of arrays of types.
trans-unit.target: 類型陣列的陣列。

trans-unit.source: Each array of types represents the required custom modifiers for the corresponding parameter, such as <see cref="T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.IsConst" />.
trans-unit.target: 每個類型陣列都代表其對應參數必要的自訂修飾詞，例如 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.IsConst" />。

trans-unit.source: If a particular parameter has no required custom modifiers, specify <see langword="null" /> instead of an array of types.
trans-unit.target: 如果特定的參數沒有必要的自訂修飾詞，則指定 <see langword="null" />，而非類型陣列。

trans-unit.source: If none of the parameters have required custom modifiers, specify <see langword="null" /> instead of an array of arrays.
trans-unit.target: 如果這些參數都沒有必要的自訂修飾詞，則指定 <see langword="null" />，而非陣列的陣列。

trans-unit.source: An array of arrays of types.
trans-unit.target: 類型陣列的陣列。

trans-unit.source: Each array of types represents the optional custom modifiers for the corresponding parameter, such as <see cref="T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.IsConst" />.
trans-unit.target: 每個類型陣列都代表其對應參數的選擇性自訂修飾詞，例如 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.IsConst" />。

trans-unit.source: If a particular parameter has no optional custom modifiers, specify <see langword="null" /> instead of an array of types.
trans-unit.target: 如果特定的參數沒有選擇性的自訂修飾詞，則指定 <see langword="null" />，而非類型陣列。

trans-unit.source: If none of the parameters have optional custom modifiers, specify <see langword="null" /> instead of an array of arrays.
trans-unit.target: 如果這些參數都沒有選擇性的自訂修飾詞，則指定 <see langword="null" />，而非陣列的陣列。

trans-unit.source: Sets the method signature, including the return type, the parameter types, and the required and optional custom modifiers of the return type and parameter types.
trans-unit.target: 設定方法簽章，包含傳回類型、參數類型和傳回類型及參數類型之必要與選擇性自訂修飾詞。

trans-unit.source: If the return type and the number and types of the parameters are known when the method is defined, they can be established using any overload of the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.DefineMethod%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method that accepts an array of parameter types.
trans-unit.target: 如果所定義之方法都已知的傳回型別和類型與數量的參數，它們可以建立使用的任何多載<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.DefineMethod%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法可接受的參數類型陣列。

trans-unit.source: However, a generic method can have parameters whose types are specified by one or more of its own generic type parameters, which cannot be defined until after the method has been defined.
trans-unit.target: 不過，泛型方法的參數型別由一或多個它自己的泛型類型參數，定義方法之後不能定義之前。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to set the parameter types in that case.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定的參數型別在此情況下使用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: If neither the return type nor the parameter types have optional or required custom modifiers, such as <xref:Microsoft.VisualC.IsConstModifier>, you can use the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.SetReturnType%2A> and <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.SetParameters%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 如果傳回型別或參數型別都不具有選擇性或必要自訂修飾詞，例如<xref:Microsoft.VisualC.IsConstModifier>，您可以使用<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.SetReturnType%2A>和<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.SetParameters%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method replaces the parameters and return type established using the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.DefineMethod%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法會取代的參數和傳回型別，建立使用<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.DefineMethod%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example contains source code for a generic class named Sample that has a type parameter `T`.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例包含名為具有型別參數的範例為泛型類別的原始程式碼`T`。

trans-unit.source: The class has a field named `Field`, of type `T`, and a generic method `GM` with its own type parameter, `U`.
trans-unit.target: 此類別具有名為的欄位`Field`，型別`T`，和泛型方法`GM`它自己的型別參數， `U`。

trans-unit.source: Method `GM` creates an instance of Sample, substituting its own type parameter `U` for the type parameter of Sample, and stores its input parameter in `Field`.
trans-unit.target: 方法`GM`建立範例中，以取代型別參數的執行個體`U`型別參數的範例中，並將其輸入的參數中`Field`。

trans-unit.source: This source code is compiled but not used; you can view it with the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md), and compare it to the code emitted by class `Example`.
trans-unit.target: 這個原始程式碼已編譯的但未使用。您可以檢視它與[Ildasm.exe （IL 解譯器）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)，並比較類別所發出的程式碼`Example`。

trans-unit.source: The code in class `Example` demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.SetSignature%2A> method in emitting generic code.
trans-unit.target: 類別中的程式碼`Example`示範如何使用<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.SetSignature%2A>發出一般的程式碼中的方法。

trans-unit.source: The `Main` method of class `Example` creates a dynamic assembly containing a class named `Sample`, and uses the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.DefineGenericParameters%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to make it generic by adding a type parameter named `T`.
trans-unit.target: `Main`類別方法`Example`建立動態組件包含類別，名為`Sample`，並使用<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.DefineGenericParameters%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，使它成為泛型藉由新增名為型別參數`T`。

trans-unit.source: A default constructor and a field named `Field`, of type `T`, are added to class `Sample`.
trans-unit.target: 預設建構函式和名為的欄位`Field`，型別`T`，加入至類別`Sample`。

trans-unit.source: A method `GM` is added, and turned into a generic method using the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.DefineGenericParameters%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 方法`GM`加入，並轉換成泛型方法使用<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.DefineGenericParameters%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The type parameter of `GM` is named `U`.
trans-unit.target: 型別參數`GM`名為`U`。

trans-unit.source: Once the type parameter is defined, the signature of `GM` is added, using the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.SetSignature%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 定義型別參數之後, 的簽章`GM`加入，使用<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.SetSignature%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: There is no return type, and no required or custom modifiers, so all the parameters of this method are `null` except `parameterTypes`, which sets the type of the only parameter of the method; this is set to the method's type parameter, `U`.
trans-unit.target: 沒有沒有傳回型別，以及任何必要或自訂修飾詞，因此這個方法的所有參數都是`null`除了`parameterTypes`，它會設定此方法唯一參數的型別，這個值設定為方法的型別參數， `U`。

trans-unit.source: The body of the method creates an instance of the constructed type `Sample<U>` (`Sample(Of U)` in Visual Basic), assigns the method's parameter to `Field`, and then prints the value of `Field`.
trans-unit.target: 方法主體建立的建構類型的執行個體`Sample<U>`(`Sample(Of U)`在 Visual Basic 中)，會指派至方法的參數`Field`，然後列印值`Field`。

trans-unit.source: A dummy type is defined, to hold the entry point method `Main`.
trans-unit.target: 定義空的型別，來保存的進入點方法`Main`。

trans-unit.source: In the body of `Main`, the static `GM` method is invoked on the constructed generic type `Sample<int>` (`Sample(Of Integer)` in Visual Basic), with type <xref:System.String> substituted for `U`.
trans-unit.target: 本文的`Main`，靜態`GM`建構的泛型類型上叫用方法`Sample<int>`(`Sample(Of Integer)`在 Visual Basic 中)，與類型<xref:System.String>取代`U`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.GetMethod%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method is used to create a <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> for the static `GM` method of the constructed generic type `Sample<U>`, and the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo.MakeGenericMethod%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method is then used to create a <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that can emitted in a method call.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.GetMethod%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法用來建立<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>用於靜態`GM`方法建構的泛型型別`Sample<U>`，和<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo.MakeGenericMethod%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法再用來建立<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>，方法呼叫中所發出。

trans-unit.source: When the code example is run, it saves the emitted assembly as TypeBuilderGetFieldExample.exe.
trans-unit.target: 當執行程式碼範例時，它會將發出的組件儲存為 TypeBuilderGetFieldExample.exe 中。

trans-unit.source: You can run TypeBuilderGetFieldExample.exe, and you can use the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) to compare the emitted code with the code for the `Sample` class that is compiled into the code example itself.
trans-unit.target: 您可以執行 TypeBuilderGetFieldExample.exe，而且您可以使用[Ildasm.exe （IL 解譯器）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)比較發出程式碼的程式碼與`Sample`會編譯到本身的程式碼範例的類別。

trans-unit.source: The current method is generic, but is not a generic method definition.
trans-unit.target: 目前的方法是泛型，但不是泛型方法定義。

trans-unit.source: That is, the <see cref="P:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.IsGenericMethod" /> property is <see langword="true" />, but the <see cref="P:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.IsGenericMethodDefinition" /> property is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 亦即，<see cref="P:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.IsGenericMethod" /> 屬性是 <see langword="true" />，但 <see cref="P:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.IsGenericMethodDefinition" /> 屬性是 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The name of the symbolic custom attribute.
trans-unit.target: 符號自訂屬性的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The byte blob that represents the value of the symbolic custom attribute.
trans-unit.target: 位元組 Blob，代表符號自訂屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: Set a symbolic custom attribute using a blob.
trans-unit.target: 使用 Blob 設定符號自訂屬性。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the metadata custom attribute, this custom attribute is associated with a symbol writer.
trans-unit.target: 不同於中繼資料的自訂屬性，這個自訂屬性是相關聯的符號寫入器。

trans-unit.source: The code sample below illustrates the contextual usage of the `SetSymCustomAttribute` method to set the byte values for the name and key of a custom attribute attached to a method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例說明的相關用法`SetSymCustomAttribute`方法，以設定名稱和自訂屬性的索引鍵的位元組值附加至的方法。

trans-unit.target: 先前已使用 <see cref="M:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType" /> 建立包含類型。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The module that contains this method is not a debug module.
trans-unit.target: 包含這個方法的模組不是偵錯模組。

trans-unit.source: -or-

For the current method, the <see cref="P:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.IsGenericMethod" /> property is <see langword="true" />, but the <see cref="P:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.IsGenericMethodDefinition" /> property is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 針對於目前的方法，<see cref="P:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.IsGenericMethod" /> 屬性為 <see langword="true" />，但 <see cref="P:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.IsGenericMethodDefinition" /> 屬性為 <see langword="false" />。
